actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The shark can breathe only underwater.
